title: Godrej Industries Announces Launch Of Financial Services Arm Godrej Capital, To Invest ₹1,500 Cr | Mint - Mint
content: Godrej Industries Announces Launch Of Financial Services Arm Godrej Capital, To Invest ₹1,500 Cr | Mint  Mint
description: Godrej Industries has committed to infuse  ₹1,500 crore into its financial services venture
